resources.string:
Over 12 years of experience as a technology professional in managing & developing high quality mobile applications in various technical-business roles


Leading & mentoring team of mobile developers


Adept in analyzing Customer/System needs, evaluating end-user requirements, custom designing solutions


Experienced in working with Clients, business managers and technical teams for executing concurrent projects


KPI driven individual who considers time-budget constraints as opportunities for growth vs obstacles


Passionate about bringing ideas on paper to life on electronics, ability to zoom in-out situational context to make appropriate decisions


5+ years of experience in mobile banking domain


3+ years of experience in US healthcare insurance domain
